Actions.Name: Call Ruin
Actions.Description: The Ruin Speaker chooses a space in range 6, that becomes known to all characters, and becomes slow (ongoing). At the start of the Ruin speakerâ€™s next turn, a ruin chunk surfaces in that space, a height 2 piece of terrain. Spaces next to this terrain are difficult. Any character occupying the space is pushed up on top of the ruin chunk but is also stunned (no save).

Actions.Name: Welcome
Actions.Description: The Ruin Speaker re-arms all lowlander traps in range 3, then immediately re-triggers the effects of all lowlander traps in range.
